website_summaries.verdict: Expertly designed down alternative jacket for outdoor winter sports, constructed utilizing Spyder technology, with loads of special features.
pros: Popular jacket useful for skiing and other winter sports

Made with 3M Thinsulate Insulation, core ventilation, waterproof lining, waterproof center front zipper, waterproof hand and chest pocket zippers, full seam taping, hook-and-loop adjustable cuffs with gussets, and interior stretch cuffs with thumb holes
Also has data card pocket and internal mesh pocket for goggles
cons: Purchasers generally love this jacket with few complaints
Sizing can be on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Really was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a ski trip to Switzerland. The details of the coat - weatherproof zippers, built-in straps, clips and vent pockets were a tremendous bonus. I normally wear an XL but had to size up to an XXL, but the jacket was not bulky and fit flawlessly. Really was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Terry K

customer_reviews.title: High-quality Spyder jacket!  Looks and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking jacket, fits perfectly, and appears to be typical Spyder quality. The front zipper seems to be a design I haven't seen before; it looks wind and water proof. When it's zipped, it doesn't look like a normal zipper, more like a solid material. Many convenient pockets and the sleeve design will guarantee I won't get snow up my sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Big Kid

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding !
customer_reviews.text: My favorite jacket ever. The material feels top quality, it has plenty pockets. Two pockets even have a little key holder and a glass wiper microfiber. It stays pretty warm at around 9 celsius. The hoodie fits a bike helmet without a problem. The jacket is completly waterproof and looks awesome with vibrant colors. I also bought it at almost half price here so I am super happy :3
customer_reviews.author: Gabo Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit, warmth, and overall performance. Nice and light as far as weight goes.

customer_reviews.title: Spyder jacket

product_meta.title: SPYDER Men’s Leader Gore-Tex Waterproof and Windproof Snow Sport Jacket
feature_bullets: Fully seam taped, removable helmet compatible hood with adjustable opening and anti-abrasion overlay film by Bemis
Waterproof center front zipper, waterproof hand and chest pocket zippers
Snap back feature holds powder skirt away when Not in use, removable powder skirt with stretch panel and core ventilation system
Velcro adjustable cuffs with gussets, interior stretch cuffs with thumb holes and drawcord adjustable hem
Data card pocket, internal zippered pocket, internal mesh Goggle pocket and Chamois lens wipe
